channel.title: Sean Casey
channel.description: Recent news about Sean Casey, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Shea's Shaming Of Liberals Over Marijuana An Attack From PMO, MPs Say
On Monday morning, Shea released a statement slamming Charlottetown MP Sean Casey, Malpeque MP Wayne Easter and Cardigan MP Lawrence MacAulay for endorsing their leader Justin Trudeau's "reckless position" on pot legalization. Read the whole ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Pot stance puts Liberal's judgement up in smoke for Shea
Charlottetown Liberal MP Sean Casey said Trudeau had no choice but to answer the question, when he was asked. The other two Liberal MPs on P.E.I. — Cardigan MP Lawrence MacAulay and Malpeque MP Wayne Easter — also said they support their ...
